name: Amazon Mining
description: supplying a wide range of Refractory Cas
overview:
We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as an established manufacturer of High Quality Refractory Castables, Bricks, Mortar & Fire Clay and supplier of all types of refractories such as High Alumina Bricks, IS-6, IS-8, Insulation Bricks.

Products: Refractory Bricks Refractory Mortars Fire Clay

Infrastructure: On a purpose of performing all our Refractory Castables & Mortars, Alumina Bricks, Fire Clay and Silica Ramming Mass related activities in a proper systematized manner, we have developed a state-of-the-art-infrastructure, which spread over a vast area of land.

Our Team: We are supported by a team of adept professionals, whose combined and dedicated efforts have enabled us emerged as a distinguished organization in this industry. Professionals, that we have possess expertise in their respective domain, which enables us to execute all the business related activities in an efficient manner. Our team is well-versed with this domain which enables us to manufacture an impeccable product-array.

Our Quality: We have been able to establish ourselves as a reputed organization in this domain in a very short time frame, owing to our high in quality array of Refractory Castables & Mortars, Alumina Bricks, Fire Clay. We process these castables and other products using premium quality aluminum oxide, iron(III) oxide, calcium oxide, silica and alumina, sourced from the most eminent vendors of the industry.
